```python
        cells = row.find_all('td')

            player_name = cells[0].text.strip()

    response = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser')
    goals = get_goals_from_soup(soup)
    return goals[0] if goals else 0

def main():
    max_goals = 0
    max_goals_season = 0
    for season in range(2010, 2023):
        goals = get_championship_stats(season)
        if goals > max_goals:
            max_goals = goals
            max_goals_season = season
    print(f'Ben Croucher scored the most goals ({max_goals}) in the Championship for Derby County during the season {max_goals_season}.')

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
```
